featured.text: Capoeira is also believed to have influenced several dancing styles like breaking and hip-hop.

definition.zh_def: 破壞或分開的行為或過程。
definition.en_def: The act or process of causing something to separate into pieces or to be damaged.
definition.example: The breaking of the glass made a loud noise.
